desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes up to five slashes ahead, the first two deal <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>, and the last three deal <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Block enemy attacks during the 5th hit of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>.

desc.0: With at least 2 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>, hold <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Hoshimi Miyabi sheaths her blade, enters <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct> and starts to charge up. Every level of charge will consume 2 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>, up to a maximum of three levels of charge.
desc.2: When releasing <IconNormal />, or when <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> is completely depleted, Hoshimi Miyabi will draw her blade and unleash a powerful slash ahead based on the current charge level, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>. She then exits <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct>.
desc.4: Hoshimi Miyabi can have up to 6 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 3 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: While dodging, repeatedly press or hold <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.4: A dash dodge that covers a lot of ground.
desc.5: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Quickly draws her blade and slashes ahead, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Rush forward, unleashing powerful slashes against enemies along the way, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: After using this skill, with enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> again to activate:
desc.5: Consume extra Energy and unleash a powerful follow-up attack against enemies in front, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.6: Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>.
desc.7: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area then pauses, before unleashing a Finishing Move, dealing massive <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Upon activating this skill, gain 3 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> and increase <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</ct> by 30% for 12s.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Charges and slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>, she applies <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</ct> against targets with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct>, increases <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. As Hoshimi Miyabi accumulates <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</ct>, it has its own independent Attribute Anomaly Buildup gauge and triggers <ct color=#98EFF0>Freeze</ct>, <ct color=#98EFF0>Shatter</ct>, and <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> that can react with other Attribute Anomalies, including <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute Anomaly</ct>, to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct>.
desc.1: When Hoshimi Miyabi applies <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> to enemies with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct>, it will consume the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</ct>, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>750%</ct> of Hoshimi Miyabi's ATK and causing the target to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state. All units accumulate <ct color=#2BAD00>14%</ct> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to these enemies. The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state ends when <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> and remove <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct>.
desc.2: Upon triggering <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</ct>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

desc.0: When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct>, she applies <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</ct> against targets with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct>, increases <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. As Hoshimi Miyabi accumulates <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</ct>, it has its own independent Attribute Anomaly Buildup gauge and triggers <ct color=#98EFF0>Freeze</ct>, <ct color=#98EFF0>Shatter</ct>, and <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> that can react with other Attribute Anomalies, including <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute Anomaly</ct>, to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct>.
desc.1: When Hoshimi Miyabi applies <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> to enemies with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct>, it will consume the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</ct>, dealing <ct color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</ct> equal to <ct color=#2BAD00>875%</ct> of Hoshimi Miyabi's ATK and causing the target to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state. All units accumulate <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to these enemies. The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state ends when <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> and remove <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct>.

All units accumulate <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <ct color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</ct> to these enemies. The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state ends when <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <ct color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</ct> and remove <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct>.
desc.2: Upon triggering <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</ct>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Support</ct> character or shares the same Faction:
desc.1: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</ct> DMG increases by 60%. When any squad member triggers <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 2 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</ct> during the next <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct> will ignore 30% of the target's <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</ct>.

1.name: Frost Atop the Snow
1.desc: While in <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct>, every 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> consumed will allow <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</ct> to ignore 6% of DEF, stacking up to 6 times and lasting until <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct> ends. When the slash for charge level three of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</ct> hits an enemy under <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct>, it will immediately remove the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</ct> state and increase all squad members' Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20% for 10s.

flavor.0: Miyabi has loved reciting poems about the cold since she was a child. She might not understand them completely, but she still does it every day.
flavor.1: Before long, she came to realize their true meaning.
flavor.2: She found clarity not on a still and snowy night, but rather upon the battlefield.

2.name: Breath Technique
2.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> DMG increases by 30%. Hoshimi Miyabi gains 1 point of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> when the final move of the 5th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</ct> hits an enemy. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 6 points of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> and her CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

flavor.0: "As goes the sword, so goes the heart." This is a key disciplinary concept of the Hoshimi school of swordsmanship.
flavor.1: Defeating the enemy is but the first step on the path to victory.
flavor.2: Maintaining constant vigilance at all times is the true way of a warrior.

3.name: Martial Discipline
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Miyabi, whose family has a tradition of martial arts, has excellent training habits. Her commitment to swordsmanship practice is unwavering. What? A meeting? She won't be going.

4.name: Rupture
4.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</ct> DMG increases by 30%. Upon triggering <ct color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</ct>, Hoshimi Miyabi generates 250 more Decibels.

flavor.0: Reciting poems during the heat of battle can regulate one's respiratory rhythm.
flavor.1: Whether it's her mindset or breathing, Miyabi always keeps calm.

5.name: Anniversary
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: The girl arrives at that all too familiar place with flowers, her breath misting and then vanishing into the cold air.
flavor.1: Her fingers ghost over that name on the monument.
flavor.2: Everything is quiet, like that most silence observer.

6.name: Prodigious Talent
6.desc: During <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains <ct color=#FFFFFF>Polar</ct>, which increases <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</ct> DMG by 30%. After obtaining <ct color=#FFFFFF>Polar</ct>, Hoshimi Miyabi will automatically draw her blade and unleash powerful slashes based on the current charge level upon consuming <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct>. Before <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</ct> is completely depleted, the draw and slashes will not interrupt charging under <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct>. Each occurrence of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</ct> can perform up to 3 draws and slashes.
6.flavor: The more she battles, the more it becomes evident to outsiders: If there is a god of swordsmanship, it must greatly favor Hoshimi Miyabi.
